summary: Remodels areas of Falkreath for a more lore friendly feeling
descriptionHtml:
==Story==
A unknown water source including waterfalls has sprung up at Falkreath causing all local wildlife and new species to grow rapidly around the village, the villagers have made improvements to Falkreath to stop the plants from overrunning the area!. 

[youtube]q8TW9POTp8w[/youtube] [youtube]S5b_5lNPIHY[/youtube]
[youtube]zMtFG0HjrEU[/youtube]
====Description====


WARNING, THIS MOD IS STILL UNDER HEAVY DEVELOPMENT AND IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE.

To begin with, i didnt like how bethesda approached there city and village creation by spamming foliage items such as trees and bushes everywhere that sometimes were put in places that make no sense. 

This changes that and many other things to Falkreath to make it \"reborn\" 

You will see a completely new Falkreath with brand new navmeshes/objects/flora and building structure and finally lighting, all to give the perfect roleplaying experience.


===Updates===

BETA 1
-Released,awaiting feedback.

1.0 Release
-Added story
-Added waterfalls and more objects into the village.
author: Countercruel
